right.text: the hippies didnt have the internet. its not that my ideas are new, just my delivery method

left.text: i'm just saying that hippies tried it, as well as several intellectuals during the 18th and 19th centuries. it's not a new or fresh idea

right.text: with todays technology just sit back and watch one person make a global difference. all gays will be slaughtered by 2032 as part of my Final Solution

left.text: oh, no, nothing can happen without the internet! there was no mass media at ALL before 1995
who? has one person ever made a significant global change through JUST the internet?
